articles.title: Deep space collision gives gravitational-wave signal, 650 million light-years away - WION
articles.description:
Astronomers have picked up a gravitational-wave signal originating from a dramatic collision deep in the cosmos. The event, dubbed GW230529, was recorded by the LIGO Livingston detector in May 2023. 

Gravitational waves are caused by the acceleration of mass…

articles.title: Dying SpaceX rocket creates eerie 'dashed' line in new photos. What's going on? - Space.com
